title: AppImages
description:
**-** Portable, self-contained, universal package type for Linux.
**-** To use an AppImage, just download it, make it executable (either through your file manager or using `chmod +x`), and run it.  
  **\*** No install required.  
  **\*** No package manager required.
**-** Include all dependencies needed to run the target program that would not be found on the average Linux system.
**-** Not sandboxed, but are completely self-contained.
**-** Some AppImages can update themselves (but won't do so without telling the user).
**-** [appimagehub](https://appimage.github.io/apps/) is the official listing of available AppImages.
